title: Dungeons & Dragons AI Assistant

âœ¨ What Does It Do?
The D&D AI Assistant is a Python-powered chatbot that helps Dungeon Masters run streamlined sessions.
Ask rules questions, roll dice, spawn NPCs, track combat, and even push tokens to your favorite VTT â€” all from one interface.
